Detailed Description

Describes a bounding box with latitude and longitude.

Get the area of the boundingbox.

Uses uint64 which is unsuitable for e.g. Symbian.

Returns:
The area of the boundingbox, in square-mc2-units.

Returns the center coordinate of the bounding box.

If invalid bounding box then invalid coordinate.

int32 &  lon
)  const
 

Returns the coordinate of the center of the boundingbox.

Parameters:
lat Output param. The latitude of the center.
lon Output param. The longitude of the center.
Returns:
True if the center could be calculated, false otherwise.

uint32 MC2BoundingBox::getCohenSutherlandOutcode (  int32  lat,
int32  lon
)  const [inline]
 

The method will check were the coordinate is located related to the bounding box and return the outcode according to the following table. 

        *   1001 | 1000 | 1010
        *   ------------------ maxLat
        *   0001 | 0000 | 0010
        *   ------------------ minLat
        *   0101 | 0100 | 0110
        *     minLon  maxLon
        * 
        *
See computer-graphics literature for more details.

Parameters:
lat Latitude
lon Longitude
Returns:
The Cohen-Sutherland outcode.

corner The corner type.

MC2Coordinate of the corner. If no_corner is supplied then an invalid MC2Coordinate is returned.

bool MC2BoundingBox::getIntersection (  int32  lat1,
int32  lon1,
int32  lat2,
int32  lon2,
byte  boundaryOutcode,
int32 &  intersectLat,
int32 &  intersectLon
)  const
 

Calculate the intersection between a boundary of the boundingbox and a line between two coordinates.

Parameters:
lat1 Latitude part of the first point on the line.
lon1 Longitude part of the first point on the line.
lat2 Latitude part of the second point on the line.
lon2 Longitude part of the second point on the line.
boundaryOutcode Boundary outcode for the boundary to intersect with.
intersectLat Latitude part of the intersection.
intersectLon Longitude part of the intersection.
Returns:
True if the intersection could be calculated, false if the boundaryOutcode was not valid or if no intersection could be found (parallell lines).

bool MC2BoundingBox::getInterSection (  const MC2BoundingBox &  bbox,
MC2BoundingBox &  interSection
)  const
 

Gets the intersecting area between two bounding boxes.

Parameters:
bbox The bounding box to retrieve the intersection with.
interSection The bbox containing the intersection if successful.
Returns:
True if there was an intersection, false otherwise.

void MC2BoundingBox::setCosLat (  float32  cosLat  )  [inline]
 

Sets the coslat factor.

This is useful when calculating the offset for the individual maps in the user's boundingbox. This method is inlined.

Parameters:
cosLat The coslat factor.

) 
 

Updates the bounding box if necessery.
